Subject: DIY Grow Lights
Description: There's a lot of interest in LED-based grow lights for people starting plants indoors, over-wintering tropical plants, and growing medicinal herbs. Where do you start? This panel will cover basic photosynthesis and light, spectral requirements, some of the options for rolling your own grow lights using high-power LEDs.  We'll also talk about some of the issues with using LEDs.  Speakers include:Roger Slykhouse - Track: DIY  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector
